name: snadi sweater
notes:
tiniest sweater of them all!

want to show everyone your true knitter spirit by hanging a raglan sweater on your purse? need to make a swatch in circle? want cute tiny sweaters to decorate your christmas tree? know a harry potter fan?

this project is for you!

**yardage** 
10 grams of regia premium merino yak or any other fingering weight yarn

**needles** 
2.25 - 2.50 mm 

**measurements** 
total height: 9 cm
bust circumference: 14 cm
sleeve length (from neckline): 9 cm

you can use fingering weight yarn to achieve measurements mentioned or any other yarn and needles to make a gauge swatch.
